name: Apple Bavarian Torte
author: TERRI DALLEN
summary: This  torte is made in a springform pan. Cream cheese, almonds, and apples deck this to the nines! Enjoy this dessert with your loved ones during the holidays.
ingredients: 6  apples - peeled, cored, and thinly sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F(230 degrees C)
Cream together butter, 1/3 cup sugar, vanilla, and flour
Press crust mixture into the flat bottom of a 9-inch springform pan
In a medium bowl, blend cream cheese and 1/4 cup sugar
Combine 1/3 cup sugar and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
Toss the sliced apples with the sugar mixture and spread over the cheese filling
Reduce heat to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and continue baking for 25 minutes
Sprinkle almonds over top of torte
Continue baking until almonds are lightly browned and apples are tender
